title: Sklar Launches Made-in-California Titanium Version of the Super Something
content:
The Sklar Super Something gets a lighter, less wallet-friendly titanium twin, with a carbon fork, clearance for 29" x 2.3" tires, and more.

Read the full article at Sklar Launches Made-in-California Titanium Version of the Super Something on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
